mapper.select: select hotel.*, ifnull(truncate(avg(review.star), 2), 0) as star from hotel left join review on hotel.hotelnumber = review.hotelnumber group by hotelnumber
select hotel.*, ifnull(truncate(avg(review.star), 2), 0) as star from hotel left join review on hotel.hotelnumber = review.hotelnumber group by hotelnumber having hotelnumber=#{hotelnumber}

select hotel.*, ifnull(truncate(avg(review.star), 2), 0) as star from hotel left join review on hotel.hotelnumber = review.hotelnumber group by hotelnumber having hotelname like concat('%', #{hotelname), '%')

select hotel.*, ifnull(truncate(avg(review.star), 2), 0) as star from hotel left join review on hotel.hotelnumber = review.hotelnumber group by hotelnumber having hashid like concat('%', #{hashtag}, '%')
